name: 謝東儒
objective: 本課程以計算機硬體及軟體之基本介紹為始，逐步引入程式設計的觀念與方法，程式設計語言以C語言為基礎，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入C++程式語言。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練及其在資訊工程上之應用，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計專業之基礎。
schedule:
1 Overview of Computers and Programming
2 Overview of C
3 Top-Down Design with Functions
4 Selection Structures: if and switch Statements
5 Repetition and Loop Statements
6 Modular Programming
7 Simple Data Types
8 Arrays
9 Midterm
10 Strings
11 Recursion
12 Structure and Union Types
13 Text and Binary File Processing
14 Programming in the Large
15 Dynamic Data Structures
16 Multiprocessing Using Processes and Threads
17 On to C++
scorePolicy:
• Programming Projects 30%
• Midterm 30%
• Final Exam 40%
• Class participation 10%
materials: K. N. King, C Programming: A Modern Approach, 2nd Edition, W. W. Norton & Company, 2008.
